fullText: The show is a clever and sometimes hilarious theatrical contraption that demonstrates the difference between accidents that happen and accidents that are made to happen with surgical precision.
dtliExcerpt: The show is a clever and sometimes hilarious theatrical contraption that demonstrates the difference between accidents that happen and accidents that are made to happen with surgical precision.
bwwExcerpt: Farce is not an acquired taste; even babies laugh at pratfalls. Rather, farce is the taste you fail to grow out of - and thank God, because sometimes only the stupidest fun will do. If this is one of those times, then "stupidest fun" should probably be plastered on the walls of the Lyceum, where The...
